Can\'t process image without storage permission

● Background remover is an app, as its name implies, has the main use for removing the background from foregrounds in images. Built by Nguyen Cong Tam, a computer science student in the DH19CS02 class, as the project for the thesis, which every 3rd year student in their 3rd semester should finish. The project started and was finished during the 3rd semester of the academic year 2020-2021, Open University of Ho Chi Minh City.

 ● Background remover uses Remove.bg API for the background removing task, with polished UI and additional features. The app serves as the basis for the Open University's scientific research contest and thus will be updated regularly until the contest's deadline 

 ● The period when I dig myself in my room completing this app is responsible for rising my fascination on both the mobile and AI industries.

 ● Nguyen Cong Tam. Student ID: 1951012112. November 8th, 2021
